question: Who among the following were associated with the birth of Swarajya Party?
option1: C. R. Das and Motilal Nehru
option2: C. R. Das and Sardar Patel
answer: C. R. Das and Motilal Nehru
explanation: Swaraj PartyÂ was formed by Motilal Nehru and Chittaranjan das in 1922.It was named as Congress-Khilafat Swarajaya Party. It also claimed to be an integral part of the Congress and professes its adherence to Non-Violence Non-Cooperation Movement and decided to boycott the legislatures.
